One of the best single player stories I have ever played. If you loved Bioshock 1 and 2, you MUST play this game. Amazing story payoff and world building.

3/5  本体剧情很好，海葬dlc更进一步升华；人物塑造很好，尤其是女主；游戏性很一般，不思进取的三部曲，每一代的各个系统构建根本没怎么变过，技能系统、武器系统、世界的构建逻辑几乎一摸一样，换皮感明显，顶多第三部进行了一点点简化和优化；到地儿-清怪-跑图的循环，中后期很乏味疲软；整体的游戏性感觉还不如dlc海葬2的潜行系统来得有趣；dlc海葬1的敌人刷新很恶心和不合理。终于脱离了前两部的阴暗画面风格，技能的诡异视觉设计依然不喜欢。三部曲最有代入感的一部（仍不及耻辱系列），整体体验白开水、泛滥、疲软

Mi puto juego favorito.

Elisabeth es mia putos

let me start off by saying i loved bioshock 1 and 2. from the moment i started this game i was in awe of how visually stunning it was. while this isnt a horrible game, i did not like it anywhere near as much as the first two. it really dragged on and felt repetitive. the story makes no sense and is way too abstract. writing was pretty bad. i was kind of forcing myself to play it towards the end just to get it over with. the dlc also was pretty underwhelming.
整挺好👌

Clearly Bioshock series is amazing. Prepare your mind for melting

Infinite es una experiencia diferente a los 2 anteriores que vale la pena probar, la jugabilidad perdio algunos elementos donde todo el peso se lo lleva la historia y la narrativa. La ambientacion/musica tampoco se queda atras, es increible. Te recomiendo que estes muy atento a la historia y los detalles para que te pierdas lo menos posible.

The best game I have EVER played! I recommend it to all players. Graphic, sound, gameplay and story are excellent. I have finished main story in 3 days (normal difficulty), but i STRONGLY recommend to play it at slow pace, I just couldn't, story dragged me. Play chapter for chapter, slowly, take your time. Explore everything, every corner, every photo, every desk, listen to what everybody say, memorize as much as you can. Game will reward you for that in many ways. Clues are everywhere, much hidden places. Lots of FPS, you can fight from the ground, you can fight in the sky, using weapons or ability, two at the time of each. Duality in all things, life and death, left and right, good and evil, love and hate, so you will have to choose from time to time, heads or tails... HEADS OR TAILS? Choose carefully, sometimes you will have to choose fast, sometimes you can take your time, but your choice will affect the game. Like in life...

모든 글로 된 내용을 세세하게 읽으면서 진행하지 않아서 뭔 스토린지 나중에 인터넷찾아보고 자세히 알게됨.
그리고 뭔가 울렁증이 조금 있고, 그냥 전투만 하면서 어떻게든 엔딩만 보려고 달렸습니다. 할인할때 사서 이정도면 만족.

Terrific game. Finished the series well.

PROS:
-Smooth and polished
-Beautiful environment, world and characters
-Terrific way to end the series

CONS:
-Way too short for my taste -- about 20 hours to finish it (some folks like 'em that short, so take that as a PRO if you are one of them)
-Somewhat low replayability (I finished it years ago and never went back)

Still, a truly great game considering -- if you follow the $1/hour rule like I do, don't pay more than $20 for the game and it will have been worth it.

일단 잘만든 작품이다 스토리가 엄청나지만 동시에 스토리설명이 불친절한감이 있다 뭐랄까 너무 대박스토리를 녹일려다보니 게임이 못버텨냇다 3D 멀미가 좀있는거말곤 전체적인 게임플레이에서 단점은없으며 번역이 약간 어이가없는 부분들이 있어서 스토리 이해가 더 안된다 갑자기? 왜? 그래서 어떻게 된거야? 이건 왜 설명안해주지? 이런 부분들이 후반 급전개때 있다 나중에 나무위키같은곳에서 스토리 해석을 봐야한다 10점인줄 알았으나 8정도 되겠다 3D멀미가 없으면 9점 아직 DLC는 안해봄

after looking at the game trailers the art style and general look of the game did put me off a bit. Altho I did decide to buy this game and I could not be more happy that I did, the art style and game mechanics are easy to adjust to and the story is very thrilling, it will keep you on the edge of your seat the more you play, it starts off slow but then you are thrown into a very complex situation that involves 3 main chareters, and the ending will leave you jaw struck, its definetly worth buying.

АХУЕННО

I'm typically not a fan of First Person Shooters, however, this game has been a HUGE exception to that. The story is magnificent. It takes you through twists and turns until everything is tied up in a nice little bow.

The array of weapons you can choose from are vast, allowing for any style of shooter. It also has additional mechanics to keep the game fresh.

If you are a fan of shooters, it is fun. If you are not a fan of shooters, I highly suggest you give it a try.
Such a good story coupled with an amazing ending one of the best games i have played

this one has been on my wishlist for a while, but i was worried that i wouldn't enjoy it since its an older game. to my surprise, it holds up remarkably well for an old game. the art style lends itself to avoiding obsolescence - if i hadn't known when this game came out, i would have assumed it couldn't have been older than from 2016.  

if you've got a free weekend or are bored with the games you have now, pick this one up, especially if its on sale. the setting is fresh and unique, the story is well-written, and the gunplay/abilities are fun and engaging. if you're a completionist, there are plenty of achievements to keep you looking for that next goal to complete.  I'm about 9 hours in and it feels like i've still got a lot more game to play.

Игра очень красивая! Это зацепила с самого начала. А потом уже, по мере прохождения, начинает увлекать сюжет. Он интересный. По мере прохождения, игра становится все интереснее, появляются новые способности и всякие фишки. В целом понравилась. Динамичная, нужно много стрелять. Патроны не бесконечные, но находятся довольно легко. Немного расстроила прокачка оружия. Но в целом нормально.

Excellent jeu, avec un scénario à couper le souffle. Les graphismes n'ont pas viellis et l'ambiance "Steampunk" ainsi que les décors nous donne envie de rester à Colombia. 
Un jeu équilibré dans le gameplay qui n'hésite pas à nous mettre dans des situations ou il faut savoir utiliser les mécaniques que le jeu met à notre disposition. 
Une vrai perle qui date de 2013 mais qui saura trouver une place dans votre bibliothèque Steam et vous promettra une bonne vingtaine d'heures de jeu si vous êtes un perfectionniste et que vous aimez fouillez partout (Et ce, sans compter les DLC qui sont eux aussi d'une qualité impressionnante et qui apporte grandement à l'histoire)
The story was amazing if you haven't had it spoiled
